Sure! Here are string pools for each of the ten scripts mentioned:

1. Chinese Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "你好爱我学习希望朋友家庭快乐";

2. Cuneiform
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "𒀭𒁹𒀭𒉡𒅗𒁲𒄩𒊩𒉣𒈪𒅴𒋼";

3. Arabic Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "مرحبا كيف حالك حب علم صديق عائلة سلام";

4. Devanagari
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "नमस्ते प्रेम परिवार ज्ञान शिक्षा दोस्त";

5. Cyrillic Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "Привет Как дела Любовь Друзья Семья Знания";

6. Greek Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "Γειά σου Αγάπη Οικογένεια Μάθηση Φίλοι";

7. Japanese Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "こんにちは愛家族学び友達幸せ";

8. Hebrew Script
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "שלום אהבה משפחה ידידות חינוך";

9. Runic Alphabet
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "ᚠᚢᚦᚨᚱᚲᚾᛁᛏᛚᛇᛉᛋᛒᚹ";

10. Mayan Hieroglyphs
csharp
Copy code
string pool = "𒀸𒁕𒀹𒁳𒁸𒀠𒁒𒃵𒁋𒀏";
These string pools can be used to generate random text from each respective writing system!
